name: Dorkanoid
description:
Break 'em!

Dorkanoid is a classic-style tile-breaker in the spirit of Breakout and Arkanoid. Break the tiles to advance to the next level, collecting both beneficial and hindering powerups (or powerdowns?)

Levels are randomly generated, providing lasting fun.

How to Play:

Use WASD, arrow keys or your gamepad's left stick to move the paddle.

ESC for menu.

If you enjoy this game, please consider dropping a comment or a donation!

Thank you for playing!
